sent.orig: Your pleasant manner towards life is the best evaluation towards HONGYU.
sent.trans: 您们对生活的愉悦态度是对弘宇最好的评价。

sent.orig: They were running towards the house, but we headed them towards the field?
sent.trans: 他们正朝那座房子跑去，但我们使他们改朝田野前进。

sent.orig: Rain came on towards noon.( It came on to rain towards noon.)
Our attitude towards ourselves should be "to be insatiable in learning" and towards others "to be tireless in teaching".
sent.trans: 对自己， “学而不厌”， 对人家，“诲人不倦”，我们应取这种态度。

sent.orig: Shaya ran towards second base as the runners ahead of him deliriously the bases towards home.
sent.trans: 沙亚朝二垒跑去，这时他前面的队员兴奋地朝着本垒的方向把垒圈了起来。
